## Rio de Janeiro Shapes
```{r, out.width="100%"}

rj_shape <- read_csv("garagensdata/rj_shape.csv")

rj_garagens_shape <- read_csv("garagensdata/garagens_shape.csv") %>% 
  group_by(id_garagem)

fig <- plot_ly(type = "scattermapbox", mode = "markers") |>
  add_trace(
    data = rj_shape,
    lat = ~lat,
    lon = ~long,
    mode = "markers+lines",
    marker = list(color = "black"),
    line = list(color = "black"),
    name = "Rio de Janeiro Shape"
  ) |>
  add_trace(
    data = rj_garagens_shape,
    lat = ~lat,
    lon = ~long,
    color = ~id_garagem,
    mode = "markers+lines",
    marker = list(colorscale = "Rainbow"),
    line = list(color = "black"),
    hoverinfo = "text",
    text = ~paste(
      "Lat:", lat,
      "Long:" , long, "<br>",
      "ID Garagem:", id_garagem
    ),
    name = "Garagens Shape"
  ) |>
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = "open-street-map",
      zoom = 9.2,
      center = list(lat = -22.9, lon = -43.45)
    )
  ) %>% 
  hide_colorbar() %>% 
  suppressWarnings() # Remove Warnings 
  
fig

```

```{r, out.width="100%"}

conexao <- dbConnect(drv = RSQLite::SQLite(), "db/busdata_class_id.db")

df_cenario_group <- tbl(conexao, "busdata_class_id") |>
  group_by(class_id, lat_mean, long_mean) |> 
  summarise(qtd_pontos = n()) |>
  collect()

fig <- plot_ly(type = "scattermapbox", mode = "markers") |>
  add_trace(
    data = df_cenario_group,
    lat = ~lat_mean,
    lon = ~long_mean,
    size = ~qtd_pontos,
    color = ~class_id,
    opacity = 0.7,
    marker = list(colorscale = "Rainbow"),
    hoverinfo = "text",
    text = ~paste(
      "Lat:", lat_mean,
      "Long:" , long_mean, "<br>",
      "ID:", class_id, "Qtd. Pontos:", qtd_pontos
    )
  ) |>
  add_trace(
    data = rj_garagens_shape,
    lat = ~lat,
    lon = ~long,
    mode = "markers+lines",
    marker = list(color = "black"),
    line = list(color = "black"),
    hoverinfo = "text",
    text = ~paste(
      "Lat:", lat,
      "Long:" , long, "<br>",
      "ID Garagem:", id_garagem
    ),
    name = "Garagens Shape"
  ) |>
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = "open-street-map",
      zoom = 9.2,
      center = list(lat = -22.9, lon = -43.45)
    )
  ) |>
  hide_colorbar() |>
  suppressWarnings() # Remove Warnings

fig

```
